content: I'm thinking it might make sense to just rotate through -- say, @pnkfelix can do next week and then @rylev and then myself in 3 weeks -- not sure how it'll work on schedules and such and we can always swap, but maybe a good start?
@rylev just a brief reminder that you're up for triage this week. I'm not sure if there's a nice way to get the rotation somehow easily accessible...
I have it in my calendar for tomorrow. I've been doing it usually on Tuesdays (and I think that's when most have been doing it). Is that fine?
Great - I should actually just setup a tri-weekly event for myself
Can someone swap slots with me for the week of 30 Aug? I’m on vacation for that week
Thanks @rylev : which week of your's do you want me to take in exchange?
Exactly - the week of the 6th of Sept
Who’s up doing triage this week? I believe I’m on deck for next week (that’s what my calendar says at least), but I’ve been mistaken before...

@pnkfelix this week the T-compiler meeting will happen on 24th (Wed) rather than 25th (Thu). Is it compatible for preparing the perf report for this week?
(by looking at the calendar I think yes, just asking to be sure)
If it’s ready in time, that’s great. If it’s not ready in time, we will just say that and move on. We have skipped it in the past (usually because of time management failures on my part)
